This is the jailbreak sub but you haven’t indicated whether or not you want to jailbreak them. In any case it would be helpful to know which iOS each phone is running. 

If not jailbreaking, you can use them for anything you want that’s built-in, or that you can download compatible wIth the iOS: camera, voice recorder, sending texts, calling over FaceTime on WiFi, as an iPod, etc.. Basically anything that’s on the phone, except as a phone… unless to have an extra phone account and an activated sim.

You keep saying these tweaks respect privacy but they literally exist for the opposite effect lmfao, you’re doing nothing to protect yourself from corporations whatsoever, zero, nothing, nil. You’re requesting data from their servers with your account on their servers that you can bet they’re harvesting information with, from location, to views, to usage habits. It’s not a “step in that direction” at all. That’s not a justification. 

The ONLY thing Snapchat tweaks like shadow are good for is to let you sneak around on other people’s stories and save their shit behind their back, and that’s a VIOLATION OF PRIVACY FOR OTHER PEOPLE who rely on the features of Snapchat such as view notifications and screenshot notifications as a form of trust. Again you’re either blissfully ignorant of how things really work, or you’re truly and genuinely coping by putting up such a half wit facade of “muh privacy” and you’re a hypocrite who violates other people’s privacy.
This is more ironic than you can possible imagine. That’s all I can say
